snippet.title: Option Tuning Car Battle 2 PS1 Gameplay HD (Beetle PSX HW)
snippet.description:
Option Tuning Car Battle 2 PS1 Gameplay
Release Date: February 18, 1999
Platforms: PlayStation
_____________________________________________
Beetle PSX HW - RetroArch Settings
Renderer: Hardware
Software Framebuffer: (✓)
Adaptive Smoothing: (✓)
Super Sampling: (✓)
MSAA: 16x
Internal GPU Resolution: 8x
Internal Color Depth: 32bpp
Texture Filtering: Nearest
PGXP Operation Mode: Memory
PGXP Vertex Cache: (✓)
PGXP Perspective Correct Texturing: (✓)
Line-to-quad hack: Default
Widescreen Mode Hack: (✓)
Frame Duping: (✓)
CPU Frequency Scaling: 100% (Native)
GTE Overclock: (✓)
GPU Rasterizer Overclock: 32x
Dithering Pattern: Off
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
  0:00 Intro
  2:53 Race 1
10:24 Race 2
16:48 Race 3
_____________________________________________
